name: Firefly
description: A cute beetle-like insect whose body emits a blinding light when threatened.

attributes.name: Blinding Light
attributes.description: Inflicts Blind on an enemy for a period of time.

skill.addDescription: Emits a blinding light from Firefly's body that deals HP-based damage to enemies around a radius

skill.addDescription: Emits a blinding light from Firefly's body that deals HP-based damage to enemies around a radius
